name: OperationOutcome.issue.severity
title: OperationOutcome.issue.severity
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: Indicates whether the issue indicates a variation from successful processing.
element.comment: This is labeled as "Is Modifier" because applications should not confuse hints and warnings with errors.
element.requirements: Indicates how relevant the issue is to the overall success of the action.

binding.description: How the issue affects the success of the action.

mapping.map: ./typeCode[parent::AcknowledgmentDetail] or unique(./inboundRelationship[parent::Observation and typeCode='SUBJ' and isNormalActRelationship()]/source[classCode="OBS" and moodCode="EVN" and implies(code, ActCode#SEV and isNormalAct())/value[xsi:type="CD"]
